site.title: TMS Bike Towing - 24/7 Cross-Border Towing Service
site.description: Professional car & bike towing service between Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore. 24-hour roadside assistance, insurance services, and cross-border vehicle transport.

hero.title: 24/7 Cross-Border Towing
hero.subtitle: Professional car & bike towing service between Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore. Emergency roadside assistance available around the clock.

services.section_subtitle: Professional towing and insurance services across Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore

towing.title: Cross-Border Towing
towing.description: Professional car and motorcycle transport between Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore. Available 24 hours for emergencies.

insurance.title: Towing Insurance
insurance.description: Coverage plans so you don't pay out of pocket when you need a tow. Available for all three countries.

coverage.title: 24/7 Availability
coverage.description: We're always open. Contact us anytime day or night for roadside assistance.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Discover quick and comprehensive answers to common questions about our services.
faq.ctaText: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our
faq.a1: We provide towing and insurance services across Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore. Our main base is in Sadao, Thailand, near the Malaysian border.
faq.q2: How do I book a towing service?
faq.a2: Simply contact us via WhatsApp at +66 96 887 3125. We're available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
faq.a3: We offer compulsory and voluntary insurance for both cars and motorcycles, with various coverage periods from 8 days to 1 year.
faq.q4: How quickly can you respond to emergencies?
faq.a4: In emergency situations, we aim to provide assistance within 1 to 1.5 hours after contacting us.

footer.address: 18 Janglon Soi 17 Samnak Kham, Sadao District, Songkhla 90320, Thailand

about.title: About TMS Bike Towing
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner for cross-border towing and insurance in Southeast Asia
about.who_desc: TMS Bike Towing provides professional motorcycle and car towing services across Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore. Based in Sadao, Thailand near the Malaysian border, we specialize in cross-border vehicle transport and insurance services. We're available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
about.service1_desc: Professional vehicle transport between Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore
about.service2_desc: Compulsory and voluntary insurance for cars and motorcycles
about.cta_subtitle: Contact us today to discuss your towing or insurance needs

cta.title: Need Help?
cta.subtitle: Contact us anytime. We speak English, Thai, Malay, and Chinese.

coverage.title: Service Coverage
coverage.subtitle: We operate across Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore
coverage.base_note: Main base: Sadao, Thailand (near Malaysian border)
coverage.radar_tagline: Cross-border motorcycle towing from Thailand to Singapore

insurance.title: Insurance Services
insurance.subtitle: Protect yourself with compulsory and voluntary insurance for cars and motorcycles
insurance.types_subtitle: We offer both compulsory and voluntary insurance for cross-border travel
insurance.compulsory_desc: Required by law for all vehicles traveling in Malaysia. Covers medical expenses in case of accident.
insurance.voluntary_desc: Additional coverage for third-party liability and vehicle damage protection.
insurance.pricing_subtitle: All prices in Malaysian Ringgit (RM). Contact us for current rates.
insurance.cta_subtitle: Contact us to discuss the best coverage for your trip. We'll help you understand what you need.

emergency.whatsappLabel: Send WhatsApp message with your GPS location
emergency.whatsappWithLocation: EMERGENCY! I need help. My location: {location}

seo.routeDescription: Professional motorcycle and car towing from {origin} to {destination}. 24/7 cross-border service with documentation support. Contact TMS Bike Towing now.
seo.cityTitle: Bike Towing in {city} | TMS Bike Towing
seo.cityDescription: Professional motorcycle and car towing services in {city}, {country}. 24/7 emergency roadside assistance and cross-border transport. Contact TMS now.
seo.needHelpDesc: Contact us anytime for emergency towing service. We're available 24/7.

faq.routeQ1: How long does it take to tow from {origin} to {destination}?
faq.routeA1: The journey typically takes {time}, depending on traffic and border procedures. We handle all documentation to make crossing smoother.
faq.routeA2: Yes, we assist with all cross-border documentation including vehicle permits and customs clearance for Thailand, Malaysia, and Singapore.
faq.cityQ1: Do you provide towing services in {city}?
faq.cityA1: Yes, we offer 24/7 towing services in {city} and surrounding areas. Contact us anytime for emergency assistance.
faq.cityQ2: How quickly can you respond in {city}?
faq.cityA2: We aim to arrive within 1-1.5 hours in most areas. Response time may vary based on traffic and your exact location.
